title: Oce worth coming back to?
body: i left oce earlier in the year too many trolls, not enough tribunal. just wondering if it's fixed between silver 3 and gold 1 yet. or still toxic as fk???

replies.body:
I'm currently Silver 1 (and was Silver 2 yesterday) and I haven't noticed much toxicity at all. 
But I think amount of toxicity is proportional to your susceptibility.

>You swore get muted, reported and blocked you freaking trolling toxic player, your constant abuse is putting me on tilt and is the only reason I've died at all. I hope at the end of this game you get banned but I doubt that will happen considering that OCE doesn't have a Tribunal which is just plain stupid because of the extreme quantity of toxic trollers just like you. 

~ OCE players that over-exaggerate and whinge way too much because they can't handle legitimate criticism or a few mean words from 12 year olds over the internet
Unfortunately there will be toxicity, but, OCE has been pretty good for a while now, even  in my low elo :D

Turn All chat off

Mute anyone who even remotely looks like (s)he's beginning to stir %%%%.

Enjoy the low ping and high rez.

> Turn All chat off
> 
> Mute everyone from game start
I'm laughing at the fact you'd think Australians could be anything else but toxic. Theirs a reason theirs no tribunal as 99% of the community would be banned.

> I'm laughing at the fact you'd think Australians could be anything else but toxic. Theirs a reason theirs no tribunal as 99% of the community would be banned.

there's* but yh not all Australians are toxic js

Well I'd say that player behavior has gotten worse, but that's my opinion. It's definitely not improved. We currently have chat restrictions, and that's it. Doesn't look like we're getting a tribunal anytime soon either.
